articles.title: Foreign companies are shifting investment out of China as confidence wanes, business group says - The Associated Press
articles.description: BEIJING (AP) — Foreign companies are shifting investments and their Asian headquarters out of China as confidence plunges following the expansion of an anti-spying law and other challenges, a business group said Wednesday.
